org.sonatype.nexus.script.plugin

Interface RepositoryApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ScriptApi

    public interface RepositoryApi
extends ScriptApi
    Repository provisioning capabilities of the repository manager.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Method Summary

      • createMavenHosted

        org.sonatype.nexus.repository.Repository createMavenHosted(String name,
                                                           String blobStoreName,
                                                           boolean strictContentTypeValidation,
                                                           org.sonatype.nexus.repository.maven.VersionPolicy versionPolicy,
                                                           org.sonatype.nexus.repository.storage.WritePolicy writePolicy,
                                                           org.sonatype.nexus.repository.maven.LayoutPolicy layoutPolicy)
        Create a Maven hosted repository.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new Repository
        blobStoreName - The BlobStore the Repository should use
        strictContentTypeValidation - Whether or not the Repository should enforce strict content types
        versionPolicy - The VersionPolicy for the Repository
        writePolicy - The WritePolicy for the Repository
        layoutPolicy - The LayoutPolicy for the Repository
        Returns:
        the newly created Repository

      • createMavenProxy

        org.sonatype.nexus.repository.Repository createMavenProxy(String name,
                                                          String remoteUrl,
                                                          String blobStoreName,
                                                          boolean strictContentTypeValidation,
                                                          org.sonatype.nexus.repository.maven.VersionPolicy versionPolicy,
                                                          org.sonatype.nexus.repository.maven.LayoutPolicy layoutPolicy)
        Create a Maven proxy repository.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new Repository
        remoteUrl - The url of the external proxy for this Repository
        blobStoreName - The BlobStore the Repository should use
        strictContentTypeValidation - Whether or not the Repository should enforce strict content types
        versionPolicy - The VersionPolicy for the Repository
        layoutPolicy - The LayoutPolicy for the Repository
        Returns:
        the newly created Repository

      • createDockerHosted

        org.sonatype.nexus.repository.Repository createDockerHosted(String name,
                                                            Integer httpPort,
                                                            Integer httpsPort,
                                                            String blobStoreName,
                                                            boolean v1Enabled,
                                                            boolean strictContentTypeValidation,
                                                            org.sonatype.nexus.repository.storage.WritePolicy writePolicy)
        Create a Docker hosted repository.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new Repository
        httpPort - The http port to accept traffic for this Repository on (optional)
        httpsPort - The https port to accept traffic for this Repository on (optional)
        blobStoreName - The BlobStore the Repository should use
        v1Enabled - Whether or not this Repository supports Docker V1 format
        strictContentTypeValidation - Whether or not the Repository should enforce strict content types
        writePolicy - The WritePolicy for the Repository
        Returns:
        the newly created Repository

      • createDockerProxy

        org.sonatype.nexus.repository.Repository createDockerProxy(String name,
                                                           String remoteUrl,
                                                           String indexType,
                                                           String indexUrl,
                                                           Integer httpPort,
                                                           Integer httpsPort,
                                                           String blobStoreName,
                                                           boolean strictContentTypeValidation,
                                                           boolean v1Enabled)
        Create a Docker proxy repository.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new Repository
        remoteUrl - The url of the external proxy for this Repository
        indexType - Use 'REGISTRY' to use the proxy url for the index as well. Use 'HUB' to use the index from DockerHub. Use 'CUSTOM' in conjunction with the 'indexUrl' param to specify a custom index location
        indexUrl - The url of a 'CUSTOM' index; only used in conjunction with the 'indexType' parameter
        httpPort - The http port to accept traffic for this Repository on (optional)
        httpsPort - The https port to accept traffic for this Repository on (optional)
        blobStoreName - The BlobStore the Repository should use
        strictContentTypeValidation - Whether or not the Repository should enforce strict content types
        v1Enabled - Whether or not this Repository supports Docker V1 format
        Returns:
        the newly created Repository

      • createDockerGroup

        org.sonatype.nexus.repository.Repository createDockerGroup(String name,
                                                           Integer httpPort,
                                                           Integer httpsPort,
                                                           List<String> members,
                                                           boolean v1Enabled,
                                                           String blobStoreName)
        Create a Docker group repository.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new Repository
        httpPort - The http port to accept traffic for this Repository on (optional)
        httpsPort - The https port to accept traffic for this Repository on (optional)
        v1Enabled - Whether or not this Repository supports Docker V1 format
        blobStoreName - The BlobStore the Repository should use
        members - The names of the Repositories in the group
        Returns:
        the newly created Repository
